Title: Replicating Mining Studies with SOFAS
Published: Mining Software Repositories (MSR), 2013 10th IEEE Working Conference on
UseOF-SZZ: Find all the bug-introducing and bug-fixing commits
Summary:
SOFAS is a platform that enables
a systematic and repeatable analysis of software projects by
providing extensible and composable analysis workflows.
Outcome:
88 studies published in the MSR
proceedings so far, we can fully replicate 25 empirical studies.
